概述  软件包   类  使用  树  已过时  索引  帮助 
 上一个类   下一个类 框架    无框架    
摘要： 嵌套 | 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法 详细信息： 字段 | 构造方法 | 方法

com.bg.check.database
类 Database

java.lang.Object
  SQLiteOpenHelper
      com.bg.check.database.Database

public class Database
extends SQLiteOpenHelper

Main database manage class, where to create task, define column, db method. But we define another class DatabaseHandler to wrap this class. DatabaseHandler is has a function to notify UI.

getInstance

public static Database getInstance()
